entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 at times. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. A few flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
